pageContext.description: The decoration of dots is set in incised lines.At C & D are reddish patches, as if from fire.
pageContext.thickness: of side 9 at A B where one terminal overlaps the other. Overall measurement is 62mm,see transcriber comment
pageContext.surface: dark brown bronze. Patches of corrosion & slight emerald green encrustment
pageContext.other: There's some ambiguity here because of the way the text is laid out on the card. I'm not sure how it should be punctuated - it could also be "of side 9. At A B where one terminal overlaps the other, overall measurement is 62mm"
pageContext.collection: The property of a Lady sold at Sotheby's 23/7/25
